name: MSI Surfaces
description: MSI Surfaces is one of the largest distributors of natural stone, quartz, porcelain, and flooring in the Phoenix metro area. Their showroom features thousands of slabs available for viewing.
hours: Mon-Fri 7:00 AM - 4:30 PM, Sat 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM

name: Arizona Tile
description: Arizona Tile operates a full showroom and slab warehouse in Tempe. Browse granite, quartz, marble, quartzite, and porcelain slabs in their indoor viewing area.
hours: Mon-Fri 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Sat 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM

name: Cactus Stone & Tile
description: Cactus Stone & Tile specializes in natural stone and tile products. Visit their Phoenix showroom to see their full selection of stone and tile materials.
hours: Mon-Fri 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Sat 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM

name: Cosentino Center
description: Cosentino Center is the exclusive showroom for Silestone, Dekton, and Sensa surfaces. View full slabs and design samples in their state-of-the-art facility.

name: Cambria Gallery
description: Cambria Gallery showcases their premium quartz surfaces in a dedicated gallery setting. Experience their full collection of American-made quartz countertops.

name: Daltile Stone & Slab
address: 2040 W Rio Salado Pkwy, Tempe, AZ 85281
description: Daltile Design Studio offers tile, stone slabs, and countertop surfaces. Their design center helps you visualize materials in your space.
hours: Mon-Fri 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Sat 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM

name: Bolder Image Stone
address: 4101 W Van Buren St, Phoenix, AZ 85009
description: Bolder Image Stone carries a wide selection of granite, quartzite, and marble slabs. Browse their warehouse to find unique natural stone for your project.
hours: Mon-Fri 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Sat 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM

name: Aracruz Granite
description: Aracruz Granite is a wholesale granite supplier in Phoenix. Contact them to schedule an appointment to view their slab inventory.

name: Classic Surfaces
description: Classic Surfaces operates a warehouse location in Phoenix carrying natural stone slabs. Call ahead to schedule a visit.

name: Architectural Surfaces
address: 9175 E Pima Center Pkwy, Scottsdale, AZ 85258
description: Architectural Surfaces is a premium surface distributor in Scottsdale. Schedule an appointment to view their curated selection of stone and surface materials.

name: ESI - Edgebanding Services
description: ESI (Edgebanding Services Inc.) is an authorized distributor of Hanstone Quartz surfaces. Visit their Chandler location to view slab inventory and samples.
